name: 3D Marble Tracks
description:
Challenge opponents from a 100 player leaderboard in a marble race!

The game rules are simple: complete each track with less throws than your opponents.

The built-in texture editor allows you to paint your marble with your favorite colors and make it stand out among the other marbles.

Smoothly rendered 3d graphics, realistic 3d physics.

Truly free: not a demo, no paid features.
